gw.api.contact

Class ReviewUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ReviewUtil

  • public class ReviewUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The ReviewUtil class provides a set of general functions for creating and interacting with Service Provider Management (SPM) Reviews.
    Author:
    nedel

    • Method Detail

      • createNewReview

        public static Review createNewReview(ReviewType reviewType,
                                     ContactHandle contact,
                                     Claim claim)
        Creates a new Review from a given ReviewType, connected to the Contact representeed by the provided ContactHandle, and the given Claim.

        This form of the method should only be used with a non-null Claim; if the Claim is null, then the form of the method taking a Contact entity should be used.

        Parameters:
        reviewType - the selected ReviewType
        contact - a ContactHandle representing the Contact to be Reviewed
        claim - the Claim for which this Contact is being reviewed
        Returns:
        the created Review entity

      • createNewReview

        public static Review createNewReview(ReviewType reviewType,
                                     Contact contact,
                                     Claim claim)
        Creates a new Review from a given ReviewType, connected to the Contact representeed by the provided ContactHandle, and the given Claim.

        This form of the method may be used with either a given non-null Claim entity or a null claim:
        * if the Claim is null, then a non-persistent Contact entity referring to ContactManager (or some other external contact source) must be used.
        * if the Claim is NOT null, then a persistent (local) Contact entity on the given Claim (that is, for which a ClaimContact referencing both the Claim and Contact exists) must be used.

        Parameters:
        reviewType - the selected ReviewType
        contact - the Contact to be Reviewed
        claim - the Claim for which this Contact is being reviewed
        Returns:
        the created Review entity

      • getReviewsByABUID

        public static IQueryBeanResult<Review> getReviewsByABUID(Contact contact)
        Returns a QueryProcessor finding the set of all Reviews for all those Contacts with a given AddressBoookUID - that is to say, those linked to a given external (ContactManager or similar) Contact. The given contact can either be that external Contact or a local Contact linked to that external Contact.

        To find reviews only for a single given local Contact, use (contact).getReviews()

        Parameters:
        contact - a given external or linked local Contact for which to find the set of Reviews.
        Returns:
        a new QueryProcessor encapsulating the query described above.

      • completeSelectedReviews

        public static void completeSelectedReviews(Review[] reviews,
                                           Location webLocation)
        Iteratively completes the set of Reviews provided; this must be called from the UI as a selectedValues action.

        If an error occurs, a UserDisplayableException will be thrown.

        In some cases, rather than throwing an exception a review will not be completeable because of missing information; in these cases a web message will be displayed.

        To complete reviews from a scripting context, rather than the UI, do not use this. Instead, call review.complete() and catch exceptions or a return value of false as necessary.

        Parameters:
        reviews - the list of Reviews to be completed
        webLocation - the pebbles Location in which this is being called

      • deleteSelectedReviews

        public static void deleteSelectedReviews(Review[] reviews)
        Iteratively deletes selected reviews; this must be called from the UI as a selectedValues action.

        To delete reviews from a scripting context, rather than the UI, do not use this. Instead, call review.delete() and catch exceptions

        Parameters:
        reviews - the list of Reviews to be deleted

      • isReviewTypeConfigured

        public static java.lang.Boolean isReviewTypeConfigured()
        Checks to see if there are any ReviewTypes configured in the system.
        Returns:
        true, if there is at least one ReviewType configured in the system.

      • haveReviewTypeForContact

        public static java.lang.Boolean haveReviewTypeForContact(Contact contact)
        Checks to see if there are any ReviewTypes configured in the system which are applicable to a given Contact's subtype.
        Parameters:
        contact - the Contact for which we might want to find a ReviewType
        Returns:
        true, if there is at least one ReviewType which would apply to this Contact's subtype.

      • haveReviewTypeForContactSubtype

        public static java.lang.Boolean haveReviewTypeForContactSubtype(Contact contactSubtype)
        Checks to see if there are any ReviewTypes configured in the system which are applicable to a given ContactSubtype.
        Parameters:
        contactSubtype - the ContactSubtype for which we might want to find a ReviewType
        Returns:
        true, if there is at least one ReviewType which would apply to this ContactSubtype.

      • findReviewTypesForContact

        public static ReviewType[] findReviewTypesForContact(Contact contact)
        Returns the ReviewTypes (if any) which are applicable to a given Contact's subtype.
        Parameters:
        contact - the Contact for which we are to return applicable ReviewType(s)
        Returns:
        an array of ReviewType entities if any apply to this Contact, or an empty array if none apply

      • getDefaultReviewTypeForContact

        public static ReviewType getDefaultReviewTypeForContact(Contact contact)
        Returns the default ReviewTypes (if any) applicable to a given Contact's subtype.
        Parameters:
        contact - the Contact for which we are to return a default ReviewType
        Returns:
        The first ReviewType entity that applies to this Contact, or null if none apply

      • getDefaultReviewTypeForContactSubtype

        public static ReviewType getDefaultReviewTypeForContactSubtype(Contact contactSubtype)
        Returns the default ReviewTypes (if any) applicable to a given ContactSubtype.
        Parameters:
        contactSubtype - the ContactSubtype for which we are to return a default ReviewType
        Returns:
        The first ReviewType entity that applies to this ContactSubtype, or null if none apply

      • filterReviewServiceTypesForContact

        public static java.util.List<ReviewServiceType> filterReviewServiceTypesForContact(Contact contact,
                                                                                   ReviewServiceType[] reviewServiceTypes)
        Return a List of all ReviewServiceType typekeys that are available for the given Contact's subtype.
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact for which we are to return a list of Service Type typekeys
        reviewServiceTypes - All available values from typekey.ReviewServiceType
        Returns:
        a list of ReviewServiceType typekeys, or an empty list if none apply.
